title: Tom Brady reacts after Fox Sports replaces Mark Sanchez with Drew Brees

title: Joe Alwyn’s clover photo sparks Swiftie claims of quiet nod to Taylor Swift
description: Swifties believe Joe Alwyn’s Instagram photo featuring a heart-shaped dish with a four-leaf clover was a subtle show of support for Taylor Swift’s $360 million masters buyback deal. Fans linked the clover to Shamrock Capital, interpreting the image as a quiet nod to Swift’s victory, even though Alwyn never addressed it publicly.
